name: The Whispering Meadow
description:
This is a Cuphead / Ori and the Blind forest inspired game, using mechanics from both of those games to create a 3D platformer. The Whispering Meadow features Ori's jump hook and dash mechanic and Cuphead's parry jumping in a 3D space. This game was made for the Mix and Game Jam 2019. 

In this game the objective is to reach the top of the tower which you are stuck in, by hooking, dashing and jumping your way through obstacles to reach the end goal.

Thank you for your expression of interest 

-Black Prism
